content: विशाखः {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of Kārtikeya. <ls>Mv. 2. 38.</ls> {@--2@} An attitude in shooting (in which the archer stands with the feet a span apart). {@--3@} A beggar, petitioner. {@--4@} A spindle, {@--5@} <ab>N.</ab> of Śiva. {@--6@} <ab>N.</ab> of a god, frequently mentioned by Pāṇini and Patañjali along with {%Skanda%}; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} see <ls>Mbh.</ls> on <ls>P. VI. 3. 26</ls>, <ls n="P.">VIII. 1. 15.</ls>
